pageContext.claim: “Ronald Reagan was really the last to make a meaningful cut and reform.  And ours is cutting and reforming.  We emphasize cut, but the reform is probably almost as important.  We've wanted to do it.  It is very tough, politically, to do it.  Hard to believe that would be, but it is very, very tough.  That's why it hasn't been done in close to 40 years.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump ignores the fact that George W. Bush and Barack Obama both passed significant tax cuts after Reagan -- and that two of Obama's tax cuts were larger.
